item.title: Post One
item.description: The story of my semester This is where Iâ€™m going to show working python code and going between R and python code. #This is python code x = [0,1,3,5,6,10,4,6,3,7,8,3,2,6,0] y = [2,3,6,3,6,8,4,2,1,4,9,2,3,6,1] yplus1=[] #create empty list for i in range(len(y)): yplus1.append(y[i]+1) print(yplus1) ## [3, 4, 7, 4, 7, 9, 5, 3, 2, 5, 10, 3, 4, 7, 2] # This is R code library(reticulate) library(ggplot2) ggplot() + geom_point(aes(py$x, py$yplus1)) # Back to python import re string = "Test this ability to import packages" re.

item.title: Project 2
item.description: library(survival) # My dataset = mgus2 head(mgus2) ## id age sex dxyr hgb creat mspike ptime pstat futime death ## 1 1 88 F 1981 13.1 1.3 0.5 30 0 30 1 ## 2 2 78 F 1968 11.5 1.2 2.0 25 0 25 1 ## 3 3 94 M 1980 10.5 1.5 2.6 46 0 46 1 ## 4 4 68 M 1977 15.2 1.2 1.2 92 0 92 1 ## 5 5 90 F 1973 10.
